game_description: StarshipVR is a 3rd person action shooter, where you fight off waves of enemy ships! Wield your Starship in one hand, and a Gravity Gun in the other as you battle for survival. Use the Gravity Gun to hurl asteroids or as a protective sheild against incoming missiles - or blast away the enemy frigates with your ship's laser cannon! Currently in Alpha phase! COMING SOON: - more levels - alternate weapons - left handed mode - more SFX
